title.rendered: Introduction to the Huawei P Smart 2020

content.rendered:
Each year, Huawei releases a range of new phones and this year brings the next generation of the Huawei P Smart 2020, with a bunch of new features. As a budget smartphone, this addition really opens the market up to a lot more people. Enjoy the very best of Huawei technology for only a fraction of the cost.

 

Unique Design

If you’ve ever seen a Huawei device, you’ll know that they are very high end feeling smartphones. They will all offer a similar, yet unique design. The more high end devices will have glass backs whilst lower tier handsets have plastic finishes for a very clean finish. With the Huawei P Smart 2020, you get a plastic frame and back. Sat in the middle of the phone is a fingerprint sensor to allow for quick, secure access. In the top corner is the camera set up. This leaves plenty of room for you to enjoy the overall gloss finish.

There are three different colour options available with the Huawei P Smart 2020. With Midnight Black, Aurora Blue and Green variants available, you’re able to choose your own style. For something a little more laid back, you might opt for the understated Midnight black choice. If you want something colourful and spritely, the Aurora Blue and Green options are your perfect match. Pulling this very clean, smooth design over to the front of the phone are the rounded edges and corners.

On the front of the phone, you’re met with a 6.21 inch LTPS IPS LCD display. This gives you plenty of room to view exactly what you want from your phone. With such a larger viewing space, you’ll be completely immersed within any films or videos you watch as well as find yourself scrolling less when browsing. With a 1080 x 2340 pixel resolution, you can ensure that everything will be in a super high quality picture too.

 

Get to know the camera

Huawei always seems to create very impressive camera systems, even in lower tier smartphones, such as the Huawei P Smart 2020. They’re known for the outstanding, crystal clear photographs you see plastered all over social media. Featured on the back of this device is a dual lens camera, consisting of a 13MP standard lens and a 2MP depth lens. These two options will give you very different finishes across your photos. You will have to manually change between lenses to avoid different styles when you don’t want them.

Most of your photos will be taken with the standard lens, creating high quality, detailed photographs. You’ll be shooting in a standard frame with no special angles or focal lengths present. You will also find that his lens helps to produce relatively high quality photos during low light situations too. With the depth lens, you’ll be able to make your photos pop out more but simply adding depth. This lens will look to accentuate highlights, shadows and colours in your subject whilst carefully softening the background. This will leave you with a very clean, professional finish on any portrait photos.

Of course, this is a lower tier handset so you aren’t going to get as many camera features as you will on newer Huawei devices. As well as this, you’ll probably find that any features it does have aren’t as high spec are other handsets. That being said, you’ll still be able to experience high quality photos with a fun range of features available.

 

Huawei P Smart 2020 Deals

We have a huge range of amazing Huawei P Smart 2020 deals across three of the best networks in the UK, Three, Vodafone and EE. Each of these options will give you a different range of extras and benefits.

Vodafone will offer you benefits depending on which plan you take out. Anyone who joins Vodafone will get to enjoy Very Me rewards through the Vodafone app. This is a feature that will give you different discounts on both big brands and smaller brands you may not know. You will also find a range of giveaways from time to time. These are updated weekly so you can use them to the max. If you join Vodafone with a red entertainment plan, you will get to choose a 24 month entertainment with a range of huge brands you use every day.

EE will offer you the chance to use a range of different trial subscriptions, ranging from 3-6 months. This is such a high value package as you’re able to use every single subscription available. Once the trial is over, you can have the option to cancel it down or continue with a monthly payment. EE have made it as simple as possible to avoid any unexpected costs.

Finally, Three offers two benefits. Anyone will have access to their Go Roam add ons. This allows you to travel to 71 different destinations and use your monthly allowance without incurring any roaming costs. This is more places than any other network. For anyone with over 12GB included, you’ll get your data covered for using apps such as Netflix and Snapchat. Stay connected to the world for longer without eating away at your data. Big brands working with Three will allow you to stay in touch and entertained for hours on end.

 

There are plenty more Huawei smartphones to suit everyone if the Huawei P Smart 2020 just isn’t for you. They offer some of the best deals on the market, especially if you’re looking to save money.
